column2: "Na Abraham waar yer kor so
"Na ɔwoo Zimran
"Na Joksan woo Seba
column3: nye Dedan. Na Dedan ne mba nye Assurim

column2: "Na Midian ne mba nye Efa
column6: nye Eldaa. Woyinom nyinara yɛ Ketura ne mba."

column2: "Na Abraham dze dza ɔwɔ nyinara maa Isaak."
"Na mbasiafo nkaa no mba a Abraham wɔ no dze
column3: Abraham kyɛɛ hɔn adze; na ogyaa hɔn kwan
column6: ber a ɔda ho tse ase no
column7: ma wɔkɔr boka asaase no do."

column2: "Na Abraham no nkwaber mu mfe yɛ mfe ɔha eduosuon enum."
"Na Abraham gyaa no sunsum mu
column5: nna oedzi mfe pii; na wɔdze no kɛkaa no nkorɔfo ho."

column2: "Na ne mba Isaak nye Ismael siee no wɔ Makepela ɔbo tu mu
column3: wɔ Hetnyi Zohar ne ba Efron ne haban no mu

column2: "haban no a Abraham tɔɔ no wɔ Hetmba nsamu no mu: hɔ na wosiee Abraham nye ne yer Sara."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ Abraham no wu ekyir no
column3: Nyankopɔn hyiraa ne ba Isaak; na Isaak tsenaa Beer-lahai-roi ho."

column2: "Afei iyinom nye Abraham ne ba Ismael a Egyptnyi Hagar
column4: woo no maa Abraham no n’ebusuasantsen:"

column2: "Ismael ne mba hɔn edzin a wɔdze frɛɛ hɔn
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn awoo ndzidzido tsetsee. Nebaiot nye Ismael n’abakan; na nkaa no nye Kedar

column2: "Binom so nye Hadad
"iyinom nye Ismael ne mba
column5: nye hɔn nseraban no tsetsee; etsitsir duebien dɛ mbrɛ hɔn aman tsetsee."

column2: "Na Ismael no nkwaber mu mfe a dzii nye yi
column3: mfe ɔha eduasa esuon: na ogyaa no sunsum mu na owui; na wɔdze no kɛkaa no nkorɔfo ho."

column2: "Na wɔtsenaa fi Havila kodur Sur a ɔwɔ Egypt enyim no
column3: edze rokɔ Asiria afamu no: na ɔnye no nuanom no anntsena wɔ abodwee mu."

column2: "Na iyinom nye Abraham ne ba Isaak n’ebusuasantsen: Abraham woo Isaak;"
"na Isaak dzii mfe eduanan no
column4: Sirianyi Betuel ne babaa a ofi Paddan-aram

column2: "Na Isaak serɛɛ EWURADZE maa ne yer
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔnyin: na EWURADZE tsiee no nkotoserɛ no

column2: "Na mbofra no dzii aper wɔ no mu; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: ebɛnadze ntsi na metse ase? Na ɔkɔree kebisaa EWURADZE."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Aman ebien na wɔwɔ wo yamu
column4: Na nkorɔfo ahorow ebien na wɔbɛpaa hɔnho mu efi wo yafun mu; Na ɔman no mu kor bɛyɛ dzen asen kor; Na ɔpanyin no bɔsom ekumaba no."

column2: "Na aber a ne nda dur dɛ ɔbɔwo no
"Na nyia odzi kan no ɔbae
column4: no ho nyinara wɔ nhwi futuww dɛ nhwi atar; na wɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Esau."

column2: "Na ɔno n’ekyir no no nua bae
column3: na ne nsa dze Esau ne nantsir; na wɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Jakob na aber a wɔwoo hɔn no

column2: "Na mbofra no nyinii: na Esau yɛɛ ɔbɔfo a onyim ahayɛ papaapa
column3: ɔhamunyi a; na Jakob dze ɔyɛɛ nyimpa a ɔyɛ ɔdwe na ɔtsetse asese mu."

column2: "Afei Isaak dɔɔ Esau
column3: osiandɛ odzii ne hanam no bi: na Rebeka dɔɔ Jakob."

column2: "Na Jakob yɛɛ edziban bi: na Esau fi hamu bae no
"Na Esau see Jakob dɛ
column4: ma me edziban yi bi na mindzi; na matɔ bitsi: dɛm ntsi wɔdze too no dzin Edom."

column2: "Na Jakob see dɛ
column3: Tɔn wo mpanyinyɛ ma me ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na Esau see dɛ
column4: migyina wuso: na ebɛn mfaso na panyin yi bɛyɛ ama me?"

column2: "Na Jakob see dɛ
column3: Dzi nsew kyerɛ me ndɛ da yi; na odzii nsew kyerɛɛ no: na ɔtɔɔn ne mpanyinyɛ maa Jakob."

column2: "Na Jakob maa Esau boodoo nye eduwa noae
column4: na ɔsoɛree ɔkɔr no kwan: na Esau emmbu ne mpanyinyɛ no hwee."
